text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { int i , ip , j , n , k , a ; int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & ip ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < ip ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { a = max ( arr [ i ] [ j ] , arr [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; i -- ; arr [ i ] [ j ] = a + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; i ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
